authors.author: O Lord my God.. then sings my soul

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
O Lord my God when I in awesome wonder,
consider all the worlds thy hands have made;
I see the stars I hear the rolling thunder,
thy power throughout the universe displayed.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Then sings my soul my Saviour God to thee
How great thou art; how great thou art;
Then sings my soul my Saviour God to thee
How great thou art; how great thou art.

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines:
And when I think that God His Son not sparing,
sent him to die I scarce can take it in;
that on the cross my burden gladly bearing,
He bled and died to take away my sin.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
When burdens press and seem beyond endurance;
bowed down with grief, to him I lift my face.
And when in love He brings sweet assurance,
my child for thee sufficient is my grace.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
When Christ shall come with shout of acclamation,
and take me home what joy will fill my heart;
when I shall bow in humble adoration, and there
proclaim, my God how great thou art.
